associations.title: [Docx] Associations
associations.description:
The associations between targets and documentations path/url.
Example: '"src/myFile.js": ["myDocsFolder/myFirstDoc.md", "myDocsFolder/mySecondDoc.md"]'.

additionalProperties.title: [Docx] Target path
additionalProperties.description:
The target path associated to the documentations.
Target could be file or folder.
Example: 'src/myFile.js' will select specific file. 'src/myFolder' will select all files inside the folder src/myFolder.

items.title: [Docx] Documentations path/url
items.description:
The documentations path or url associated to the target.
Documentations could be path or url (currently, only github repository is accepted, if the repository's private, add your token in the the providers informations).
 Example: '["myDocsFolder/myFirstDoc.md", "myDocsFolder/mySecondDoc.md"]'.
